rows.label: qst701301_msg0001
rows.name:
Look, no matter how many times you
bring it up, I still don't want to hear it!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0002
rows.name:
We don't know when the next attack
might come, do we? There's no place
for levity at a time like this!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0003
rows.name:
No, Sarah, you don't understand!
That's exactly why! Nobody knows
what's coming!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0004
rows.name:
We were destined to be together,
you and I!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0005
rows.name:
...No, wait! Don't go!
At least let me ask you this!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0006
rows.name: Why are you so sad all the time?!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes! It's as if you're always trying to
bottle up all your emotions!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0009
rows.name: Look, like I told you, it's because...

rows.label: qst701301_msg0010
rows.name:
No, you know what? I'm done! Why
bother explaining myself to you when
you don't respect me enough to listen?!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh, Sarah! I love your angry face, too!
It's so adorably contorted!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0013
rows.name:
...OK, fine. If you want to get with me
so much, bring me a Rainbow Blossom
as proof of your feelings!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0014
rows.name:
You want flowers?
Oh, what a wonderful idea!
Why didn't I think of that?!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0015
rows.name:
But, wait a minute...
Isn't that particular genus extinct?

rows.label: qst701301_msg0016
rows.name:
Oh, well, if you're going to let THAT
stop you, then we've got nothing left
to talk about.

rows.label: qst701301_msg0017
rows.name:
...No! No, this isn't over!
In fact, it's just beginning!

rows.label: qst701301_msg0018
rows.name:
Sarah! The love I feel for you will
never die! Just like I hope that extinct
flower didn't! And I'll prove it to you!
